name: remote-vm-bridge
description: Remote VM + WebSocket Bridge for IDE

scripts.test:health: node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:3001/health', (res) => { res.on('data', (d) => process.stdout.write(d)); res.on('end', () => process.exit(0)); }).on('error', () => process.exit(1))"

author: MominAI
